column1: #text=Yesterday , I went to get a haircut .
#text=When I walked into the salon , a lady named Sara came over and told me to follow her to the shampoo station .
#text=I sat in a chair and another lady named Marsha washed my hair and put a towel around my head .
#text=She then took me over to Sara who asked me to sit in her chair and put a cape around my neck .
#text=Next Sara asked me how short I wanted my hair .
#text=I told her I still wanted it to be a little past my shoulders , therefore , she should only cut off about 1 inch .
#text=She told me that was fine and began cutting my hair .
#text=It took her about twenty minutes to cut an inch off of all of my hair .
#text=After she cut it , she took the blow dryer out and dried my hair .
#text=Then she curled it with a curling iron .
#text=So I paid her for cutting my hair and told her how much I appreciated the great job that she did for me !
